name: Bluedot
description: Bluedot is a payment platform for electric vehicle (EV) drivers and fleets. The company provides a universal charging payment and rewards platform that helps individual drivers and fleet owners manage charge schedules, statistics, and maintenance remotely. Their platform enables users to track real-time availability of EV charging stations and streamlines access to public charging infrastructure.

recent_developments.title: Partnership with Rivian
recent_developments.description: Bluedot now supports Rivian's Mobile Service fleet operations by streamlining access to chargers, automating reimbursement, and simplifying tracking.

recent_developments.title: Launch of Bluedot Shared
recent_developments.description: Bluedot launched Bluedot Shared, a service that unlocks private fleet depots to broaden EV charging access, ensuring fleets gain consistent, reliable depot charging access while offering infrastructure owners increased utilization.

recent_developments.title: Partnership with Verra Mobility
recent_developments.description: Verra Mobility partnered with Bluedot to offer electric vehicle charging solutions, consolidating billing across different networks.
